content: {A歪头}Well mah, farmin's still kinda new to you, right? Feelin' just a lickle bit lost? Don't you worry. I'm right here with you.
info: 关于种植水稻-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: First, you have to dig holes in the ground with a <style=Highlight>shovel</style>, then plant everything from the <style=Highlight>seed packet</style> in them, and seedlings will sprout.
info: 关于种植水稻-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: Now, pay close attention! Remember to use the <style=Highlight>watering bucket</style> to water your seedlings. That's how you'll get good results.
info: 关于种植水稻-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: {A笑眯眯}I'm still tryin' out new seeds! When I find ones that'll grow here, I'll ask <style=Highlight>Glenn</style> to stock up, so everyone can get 'em.
info: 关于种植水稻-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: Well mah, have you ever dug up a seedling by accident? No biggie, just plant 'em right back.
info: 关于种植水稻-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: {A笑眯眯}They may look fragile, but they're actually super tough. They'll always take root deep in the soil to survive.
info: 关于种植水稻-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: But I found out mah, since the planet isn't very big, we can't grow too many cropsies.
info: 关于种植水稻-云果闲聊_主流程文本3

content: {A歪头}If you notice that the soil where you planted the seedlings stays grayish-white no matter how much you water it, you might've planted too many and used up all of the soil's nutrients.
info: 关于种植水稻-云果闲聊_主流程文本3
